Name: Coptic textile
Description: A textile fragment in wool and linen. The decoration is a lozenge band of scattered buds, a central bud within each medallion. Small flowers and half buds fill the spaces between, the whole within geometric borders. The colours are <!-->turquoise, red, green, orange, indigo, purple and yellow.Ends per inch (warp threads): 40 over ground, 20 over tapestry.Picks per inch (weft threads): 44 over ground, 104 over tapestry.
